long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your GitHub browsing experience with the Github Repo Code Stats Chrome extension!

What does it do?

When you're viewing a GitHub repository, this extension allows you to:

Instantly View Code Statistics: By clicking the extension icon, fetch and display detailed code statistics of the repository you're browsing.
Visualize Data with Interactive Bar Charts: See a clear and concise bar chart showing the number of lines of code per programming language used in the project.
Adjustable Chart Size: Customize the size of the chart to fit your screen or preference for optimal readability.
User-Friendly Loading Indicator: Experience smooth data retrieval with a loading indicator that keeps you informed while the statistics are being fetched.

Why should you install it?

Gain Quick Insights: Understand the composition and complexity of repositories at a glance without digging through code files.
Enhance Productivity: Save time by getting immediate visual summaries of codebases, aiding in faster decision-making.
Improve Learning: Ideal for developers who want to study how different languages are utilized across projects.
Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly within your GitHub workflow without the need to leave the page or use external tools.
Get Started Now!

Install the Github Repo Code Stats Chrome extension today to transform the way you explore and analyze GitHub repositories. Make informed decisions and accelerate your development process with this essential tool.
